com.chapman.operationsaferide

Class TextNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chapman.operationsaferide.TextNotification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationSystem

    public class TextNotification
extends java.lang.Object
implements NotificationSystem
    Created by klamkin on 4/4/16.
    Author:
    klamkin
    See Also:
    NotificationSystem}. Help from http://www.techrepublic.com/blog/software-engineer/how-to-send-a-text-message-from-within-your-android-app/ This class implements the NotificationSystem interface. It will use the attributes userNumber and message to create new messages and send them out as notifications in the form of text messages.

      • addNotification

        public void addNotification(java.lang.String newMessage)
        This function sets the message of this class which will then be used later on in the sendNotification function
        Specified by:
        addNotification in interface NotificationSystem
        Parameters:
        newMessage - a String that will be set to the message attribute of this class. This message will then be sent to the userNumber later in the sendNotification function

      • sendNotification

        public boolean sendNotification(java.lang.String subject)
        This function sends the String message to the userNumber in the form of a text message.
        Specified by:
        sendNotification in interface NotificationSystem
        Returns:
        boolean if true then the message is sent and if false then the message wasn't sent
